Rules:

- Follow all usual forum rules. Be racist/sexist/homophobic/etc. and it WILL be [Clobberin' Time](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j9BOoH6kOHo/TtSr6ML7VNI/AAAAAAAAAKs/gMIUVj6LfpA/s320/its+clobberin+time1.gif)

- The Goal here, as said above, is to keep this light and funny. I wont stop you from getting into

 darker subjects, but I would please ask you refrain from that

- Though it should be obvious thus far, you do NOT have to stay on topic with other posts. In fact,

 I recommend that you try NOT to stay on topic (as long as you aren't just shouting "Elephants!"

 Every few posts).

- Have fun. Yeah, its totally clichÃƒÂ©d, but its especially true here ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

To begin, I would like to ask everyone this: If you could be any vegetable, what would it be? We shall lead by example here, so if I could be any vegetable, it would be the Potato.

Potato is love!

Hail Potato!
Let us all join in prayer for the Dark Lord Poppy. Oh, Dark Lord Poppy, how you grace us with our existence and your delicious presence on top of bagels.
Hopefully the great potato will grant you the ability to read and put games like this in the, oh, I don't know, the games forum.

I may-or-may-not have only realized the existence of said games thread until after I posted it. Hey, ya gotta do something stupid to learn, sometimes ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
